caption.p: Bland Altman plots showing agreement between: ( a) Commercial IBL respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) IgG ELISA and plaque reduction neutralisation test (PRNT) RSV antibody titres ( b) Crude RSV lysate IgG ELISA antibody and PRNT RSV antibody titres. The 95% limits of agreement, mean difference and averages are also shown for each graph. PRNT and ELISA IgG antibodies are presented using base2 log scale.
